versionInfo.title: Version {version}
versionInfo.description: This is the very first version of Oikion. As we're just getting started, some actions might not work perfectly or could cause unexpected results. If you encounter any issues, please let us know through this feedback form. Your patience and feedback help us improve the app for everyone.

fields.feedbackType: What type of feedback is this?
fields.feedbackPlaceholder: Please share your thoughts, report a bug, suggest a feature, or ask a question...

descriptions.feedbackType: Choose the category that best describes your feedback
descriptions.feedback: Be as detailed as possible so we can better understand and address your feedback

consent.title: I consent to diagnostic data capture for bug reporting
consent.description: Hover over each icon to learn what we collect and how we handle it
consent.required: You must consent to diagnostic data capture to submit a bug report.

screenshot.title: Screenshot
screenshot.subtitle: App window only
screenshot.description: We capture only the Oikion application window displayed in your browser. This excludes other tabs, applications, your desktop, and this feedback form.

consoleLogs.title: Console Logs
consoleLogs.subtitle: Error & debug info
consoleLogs.description: Browser console logs including error messages, warnings, API calls, and debugging information specific to the Oikion application only.

processing.title: Processing
processing.subtitle: Secure & private
processing.description: Data is sent securely via email to our development team and used solely for debugging and fixing the reported issue. We never share this information with third parties.

retention.title: Retention
retention.subtitle: 90 days after resolution
retention.description: Diagnostic data is retained for up to 90 days after the bug is resolved, then permanently deleted from our systems.

messages.success: Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate your help in making Oikion better!
messages.error: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

validation.feedbackRequired: Feedback must be at least 10 characters.

history.title: Feedback History
history.description: View all your past feedback submissions and conversations
history.noFeedback: No feedback submissions yet. Submit your first feedback to see it here!

chat.title: Feedback Conversation
chat.description: Chat with our support team about your feedback
chat.inputHint: Press Enter to send, Shift+Enter for new line
chat.waitingForAdmin: Our team will respond to your feedback soon
chat.loadError: Failed to load conversation. Please try again.
chat.sendError: Failed to send message. Please try again.
chat.maxCommentsReached: Maximum messages reached for this feedback
